item.title: Chapter 1 Safety-precautions
item.description: Manual Warning Sign Definitions ⚡DANGER: Indicates a potentially hazardous situation which, if not avoided, could result in death or serious injury. ⚠️WARNING: Indicates a potentially hazardous situation which, if not avoided, could result in minor or moderate injury or damage to the equipment. ❗CAUTION: Indicates a potentially hazardous situation which, if not avoided, could result in incorrect operation or unsafe use of the equipment. ⚠️ WARNING ⭕ If the variable frequency drive is damaged, exposed to water, or has missing parts, it should not be installed or operated.

item.title: Warranty-Instructions
item.description: Thank you for choosing our company’s products. To ensure that you enjoy high-quality service with the products purchased from our company, please read the following terms: Standard Warranty Period The standard warranty period for our general-purpose variable frequency drives is twelve months from the date of shipment (based on the shipment information on the machine’s barcode). Warranty Coverage During the warranty period, if the product fails under normal operating conditions, our company will provide free product repair with the warranty card.
